project_info.title: AI Transformation Delivers $111.9M Annual Benefit with 99.9% Confidence

outline.title: AI Transformation Delivers $111.9M Annual Benefit with 99.9% Confidence
outline.summary: Executive overview of the AI transformation initiative, highlighting the $111.9M annual benefit, 99.9% confidence level, and 2,138% ROI.

outline.title: Monte Carlo Simulation Reveals $131M-$222M Benefit Range
outline.summary: Detailed Monte Carlo simulation results showing the probability distribution of financial benefits, with an expected value of $175M.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/nrfinance_repo/slide2_monte_carlo.png - The slide explicitly discusses Monte Carlo simulation and financial projections. Image 2 is a perfect visual representation of a Monte Carlo distribution curve and financial outcome analysis.

outline.title: Platform Benefits Show Strong Probability of Success
outline.summary: Risk analysis breakdown by platform, highlighting the high confidence levels for Sales Intelligence and Knowledge Management.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/nrfinance_repo/slide3_platform_analysis.png - The slide discusses five platforms and their risk assessment. Image 3 is an "Executive Business Infographic" showing five interconnected nodes with confidence checks, which visually represents the five platforms and their risk/confidence levels.

outline.title: 18-Month Phased Implementation Minimizes Risk
outline.summary: Visual timeline of the 18-month implementation plan, detailing the 6 phases, key milestones, and resource investment.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/nrfinance_repo/slide4_timeline.png - The slide details an 18-month phased implementation timeline. Image 4 is a clear, professional 18-month implementation roadmap/Gantt chart, directly matching the slide's content.

outline.title: Recommendation: Approve Initiative with Phased Funding
outline.summary: Final recommendation to approve the initiative, outlining the strategic benefits, funding request, and governance framework.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/nrfinance_repo/slide5_recommendation.png - The slide is the final recommendation, focusing on corporate growth, transformation, and executive approval. Image 5 is a "Corporate Growth & Transformation Strategy" infographic with a clear "APPROVED" recommendation box, which is highly suitable for a closing recommendation slide.
